body_html: This intention here is to handle checkpointing of Variables placed on GPU when running with explicit device placement policy in Eager mode. I am submitting a fix that copies it to the CPU on the same machine instead of overriding the device to "/device:CPU:0" which might place it on a different job.
body_text: This intention here is to handle checkpointing of Variables placed on GPU when running with explicit device placement policy in Eager mode. I am submitting a fix that copies it to the CPU on the same machine instead of overriding the device to "/device:CPU:0" which might place it on a different job.
body: This intention here is to handle checkpointing of Variables placed on GPU when running with explicit device placement policy in Eager mode. I am submitting a fix that copies it to the CPU on the same machine instead of overriding the device to "/device:CPU:0" which might place it on a different job.
